Location

Services Offered at this Location

  • Personalized programs for sustainable weight loss
  • Nutritional management of type 2 diabetes
  • Cholesterol and hypertension management
  • Support for Irritable Bowel Syndrome (Low FODMAP approach)
  • Nutrigenomics consultations (on request)
  • And other personalized dietary follow-ups...

All consultations at Wolu20 Medical Center are provided by Pierre Abou-Zeid, a certified Dietitian-Nutritionist (INAMI) and MONASH certified.

Diaeta welcomes you to Wolu20 Medical Center (Woluwe-Saint-Lambert) to support you in achieving your health and wellness goals.
